2096770.name: GameGuru MAX - Animation Booster Pack
2096770.description:
A great selection of character animations to boost your GameGuru MAX collection!

There are over 150+ animations in this pack that cover the following categories:

  • Additional combat stances for rifle, pistol, and shotgun
  • General activities and conversations
  • Sitting and sleeping
  • Idle animations
  • Death poses

These animations are created by the highly respected GameGuru artist and community member Mark Blosser AKA Bond1 and will give your games a more unique look and feel for levels that use neutral, ally, and enemy characters.

Here is a detailed list of all spot animations included with this booster pack:

Activities Animations:

  • applauding
  • bow formal
  • bow kneel
  • bow standing
  • cooking skillet
  • crafting workbench
  • gardening gathering
  • hammering wall
  • handsaw
  • kneeling cleaning loop
  • kneeling cleaning start
  • kneeling cleaning stop
  • ritual dance
  • ritual spin dance
  • ritual stomp dance
  • salute
  • shovel dig
  • sit play drum
  • stock shelves
  • waving to crowd
  • wipe countertop

  • chair sit arms crossed

  • chair sit down

  • chair sit table tired
  • chair sit talk calm
  • chair sit talk excited
